product.text:
The Rescuers

In this action-packed novelization of Disney’s animated film, Miss Bianca and Bernard, two enterprising mice from the Rescue Aid Society, come to the aid of a kidnapped orphan named Penny. With the help of a cat named Rufus and the cooperation of local animals, Bianca and Bernard follow the clues to find Penny, who is being held captive by the evil Madame Medusa. With courage, cooperation, and the teamwork of a bevy of animals, Penny is freed from her captor’s clutches and united with a loving adoptive family.

Tie-in Activity: Follow up with a discussion about safety, including kidnapping prevention tips. With help from your child, develop a code word and instruct your child to never go with a visitor who doesn’t know the code. Also, review your child’s address and phone number and show her how to dial 911.
